title: Defaced - Marissa Farrar
description:
Defaced - Marissa Farrar
 
Monster 
Hidden away from society by his criminal father, there lives a man who has never entered the outside world. Now, having taken over his fatherâ€™s business, he has all the money and power he could dream of, yet still he refuses to let himself be viewed by the rest of society.

Lily 
Traumatised by an event in her past, Lily Drayton has a phobia of being touched. Though she helps people externally with her skills as a laser therapist, she refuses to let anyone in, emotionally or physically. When Lily is kidnapped on the way home from work one evening, she discovers sheâ€™s not the only person who keeps themselves cut off from the rest of the world.

Defaced 
A man owns her nowâ€”a man both dangerous and enigmatic. Drawn by his dual beauty and hidden pain, he awakens something inside her, something she believed was long dead. Brought to a room without windows, sheâ€™s given an impossible task: to make her owner acceptable to the outside world.

Can altering his face change who he is as a man, or is he truly a monster, both inside and out?
 
Denied - Merissa Farrar
 
Lily

After Monster makes an impossible choice that throws her world into chaos, Lily finds herself back in America. Unable to allow what happened to her to go unpunished, and riddled with survivorâ€™s guilt, Lily decides she needs to track down the traffickers who took her.

Monster

Monster has only ever wanted to keep his Flower safe, but, when he hears of her plans, he is forced to take control once more. Stepping out of his comfort zone, he vows to once more make her his captive.

Denied

Except Lily doesnâ€™t know the true reason for Monster making the choice that has led to her current situation, and her actions have made her the target of someone who wants a debt paid â€“ a debt that must be paid in flesh
